title: 3 Bedroom House
posting_body: This home is located north of Lakeshore Blvd, with a private park at the end of the street in a wonderful and friendly community.
First Floor: Updated Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, and Sun Room.
Basement has been "dry locked" with new floor and wall paint.
Garage with automatic door and room for a car and additional storage.
Central air conditioning, and forced air heating.
Home is available furnished or unfurnished beginning in September.
